articles.description: Although the weekend’s announcements postponing Ringo Starr’s two recent tour dates stressed that the 82-year-old singer-drummer did not have COVID, the former Beatle has since tested positive. The next six dates of the legendary former Beatle’s tour with his…

articles.author: Nicholas Rice
articles.title: HARDY Suffers 'Significant Injuries' in Tour Bus Crash: 'I'm Alive and That's All That Matters' - Yahoo Entertainment
articles.description: HARDY has been released from hospital but "ordered by doctors to recover for the next few weeks," he said Sunday
articles.content:
HARDY and his crew are recovering from a serious tour bus crash.
